name: Fate's Vow
flavorText: "This helm belongs to those who are dead. All who have worn it have died, and all who wear it yet shall follow." —Unknown
flavorTextHtml: "This helm belongs to those who are dead. All who have worn it have died, and all who wear it yet shall follow." —Unknown

secondary.textHtml: Army of the Dead deals an additional 207% damage and gains the effect of the Unconventional Warfare rune. (Necromancer Only) [200 - 250]%
